20-20-20_rule.title: The 20-20-20 Rule
20-20-20_rule.evidence: Research from the American Optometric Association shows that following the 20-20-20 rule significantly reduces digital eye strain symptoms.
benefits: Prevents dry eyes from reduced blinking

blink_rate.title: Blink Rate and Eye Health
blink_rate.evidence: Studies indicate that computer use reduces blink rate by 40-50%, leading to dry eye syndrome.

short_breaks.title: Short Frequent Breaks
short_breaks.evidence: Ergonomic research recommends 20-second micro-breaks every 20 minutes for sustained computer work.

distant_gazing.title: Distant Gazing Benefits
distant_gazing.evidence: Looking at distant objects helps relax the ciliary muscle in your eye, which has been overworked during near-vision tasks.
